text: Boardman is a unincorporated community in Boardman Township, Mahoning County, Ohio, United States. It is a suburb south of Youngstown. Boardman is one of two major retail hubs in the Mahoning Valley. Until 2020, it was a census- designated place (CDP). The population of the CDP was 35,376 at the 2010 census. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Boardman, Ohio
